analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo abyākatassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na aupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo … cha pañhā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe cha, anantare samanantare upanissaye
analyzed: paccayo cha pañhā saṅkhitta ārammaṇe cha anantare samanantare upanissaye

original: cha, purejāte tīṇi, kamme pañca, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: cha purejāte tīṇi kamme pañca āhāre tīṇi atthiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo
analyzed: na kusalam na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo anupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo
analyzed: na kusalam na anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe cha pe āsevane tīṇi pe
